channel.title: week03 on Reproducible Data Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in week03 on Reproducible Data Analysis

item.title: Data frames: Your new favorite data structure
item.description: Discusses the data structure called data frames: what they are and why they are so important.

item.title: Week 3 Resources
item.description: The RStudio list of cheat sheets. The Data Import, Data Transformation, Data Visualization, and RStudio IDE cheat sheets will be particularly valuable to you. R for Data Science Chapter 3 Hadley Wickham on Tidy data. Note that this old-ish paper uses the syntax of a package called plyr, which is a bit different from the tidyverse counterpart called dplyr.

item.title: Homework 3
item.description: This homework, as well as homework 2, is due Wednesday Sept 16.

item.title: Class Style Guide
item.description: Explains why it is so important to format your code well, and how you are expected to format your code for this class.
